title: Search without using caches
description: For testing, I often need to perform a query and see the actual time it takes (rather than the time it takes to look it up from the cache).  We'll need various options such as bypass the docsets, docs, or results.

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content:

http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/lucene-dev/201005.mbox/%3Calpine.DEB.1.10.1005251052040.24672@radix.cryptio.net%3E
